file.operation.bigfilesize.name: Big File
file.operation.bigfilesize.description[zh_CN]: 用于拷贝时判断文件是否是大文件的size，默认是80MB，value的单位是byte
file.operation.bigfilesize.description: Size used to determine whether a file is a large file during copying，the default is 80MB,The unit of value is byte

file.operation.blockeverysync.name: Safe synchronization mode
file.operation.blockeverysync.description[zh_CN]: 安全同步模式是拷贝到外设块设备时，每次写入执行同步到设备。高性能模式是拷贝到外设块设备时，每个任务完成后在进行同步到设备。
file.operation.blockeverysync.description: Safe synchronization mode is when copying to a peripheral block device, synchronize to the device for each write. High-performance mode is to synchronize to the device after each task is completed when copying to a peripheral block device.

file.operation.broadcastpastevent.name: Broadcast file past event result
file.operation.broadcastpastevent.name[zh_CN]: 上报文件粘贴事件结果
file.operation.broadcastpastevent.description[zh_CN]: 打开此配置，上报粘贴事件的结果到指定位置
file.operation.broadcastpastevent.description: Open this configuration and report the results of the paste event to the specified location.
